name: Lighthouse
description: Embed Google Lighthouse HTML result in Azure Pipelines
author: GSoft
helpMarkDown: Embed Google Lighthouse HTML results in Azure Pipelines. You need to provide your own installation of the npm package lighthouse.

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: CLI arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: The [CLI arguments](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse) to pass to Lighthouse. One argument per line.

inputs.name: evaluateAuditRules
inputs.label: Enable audit score evaluation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allow you to write audit score rules that will be evaluated. The task will fail if any rule fails.

inputs.name: auditRulesStr
inputs.label: Audit rules
inputs.helpMarkDown:
One rule per line. Rule formatting:
`my-audit-id = 1` (expect score of my-audit-id to be equal to 1)
`my-audit-id > 0.5` (expect score of my-audit-id to be greater than 0.5)

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you already have Lighthouse installed on your agent and want to use it, specify here the directory of the package.json where Lighthouse is referenced.
